title: ZAWNAWLNA
lyrics:
Pathian angchhung thianghlimah chuan 496
Pathian Beramno thianghlim 176
Pathian hmangaih kan hre zo lo 597
Pathian hmangaihna chungnung ber 46
Pathian hmangaihna ropuizia 43
Pathian hmangaihnain ka thinlung sual a hneh 443
Pathian hnen ata ka bo hnu 373
Pathian Lehkha ka ring e 565
Pathian min hmangaihna a va ropui em 38
Pathian mite u 15
Pathian ropui rawh se chhandamna petu 4
Pathian thil rel dan chu 22
Pathian thlarau Thianghlim 302
Pathianin a Kohhran 364
Pathianin a tirah inneih hi a siam 576
Pathianin khawngaihin 42
Pathianin khawvel a hmangaih 123
Pathianin mi sual a hmangaih 41
Pathianin thatin min vur thin 600
Pen ru pen ru Kristaa nun thar neite u 359
Pialral chawlhna tha tak a awm 477
